refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: zf = filtic (b, a, y) zf = filtic (b, a, y, x)

listitem.para: vector of real or complex numbers
vector of real or complex numbers
vector of real or complex numbers
vector of real or complex numbers

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function finds the initial conditions for the delays in the transposed direct-form II filter implementation. The vectors b and a represent the numerator and denominator coefficients of the filter's transfer function.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: filtic([i,1,-i,5], [1,2,3i], [0.8i,7,9]) ans = 0.00000 - 22.60000i 2.40000 + 0.00000i 0.00000 + 0.00000i This function is being called from Octave
